products.name: Wheat
products.desc: Wheat is a grass widely cultivated for its seed, a cereal grain which is a worldwide staple food.

products.name: Rice
products.desc: Rice is the seed of the grass species Oryza sativa (Asian rice) or Oryza glaberrima (African rice).

products.name: Sugar
products.desc: Sugar is the generic name for sweet-tasting, soluble carbohydrates, many of which are used in food.

products.name: Tea
products.desc: Tea is an aromatic beverage commonly prepared by pouring hot or boiling water over cured leaves of the Camellia sinensis, an evergreen shrub (bush) native to East Asia.

products.name: Kerosene
products.desc: Kerosene is a combustible hydrocarbon liquid which is derived from petroleum, widely used as a fuel in industry as well as households.

products.name: Salt
products.desc: Salt, commonly known as table salt or sea salt, is a mineral composed primarily of sodium chloride (NaCl), a chemical compound belonging to the larger class of salts; salt in its natural form as a crystalline mineral is known as rock salt or halite.

products.name: Flour
products.desc: Flour is a powder made by grinding raw grains or roots and used to make many different foods.

products.name: Mustard Oil
products.desc: Mustard oil is a vegetable oil derived from the seeds of the mustard plant (Brassica juncea).
